name: naps2-rust-bindings
description: Rust bindings for NAPS2.Sdk on macOS

scripts.download-naps2: rm -rf vendor/naps2 && mkdir -p vendor && git clone https://github.com/cyanfish/naps2.git vendor/naps2
scripts.build: npm run download-naps2 && npm run build:naps2-sdk && npm run build:cs && npm run build:rust
